fields.description: This is the maximum call length (in seconds) that the user can do. If the value for this configuration key is 0, then all calls will have a maximum duration of one day.
Max number of promo subscriptions per subscriber.

Promo limit type: Possible options: [A, B, NA] 
 A - Limit number of subscription per promo 
 B - Limit number of subscription for all promos  
 NA - No Limits 
The upper limit on the number of allowed subscriptions is defined by the key 'max_promo_subscription'

Maximum number of groups that a subscriber can create.
Put 'NA' for unlimited.
Minimum balance required that a subscriber must have in order to avail a promo. Default value is 0.
Allowed interval (in days) in which a mobile subscriber can edit his/her group members.
This is the required maintaining balance to be able to do calls and texts under a promo.
